alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 4:28AM MDT until April 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30-40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Dona Ana and Otero Counties, El Paso County. * WHEN...For the Blowing Dust Advisory, from noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from noon today to midnight MDT tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Critical to extreme fire weather conditions will also continue. A Red Flag Warning is also in effect.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
